The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 November is 1,340,635 (2,381.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 20 November, there were 122,929 new confirmed cases (218.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 November, there were 155,165 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 21% (32,236 fewer cases).
